entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 11.

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
